Text: i guess ill continue living and working and paying taxes to a government that doesnt give a shit about me and paying rent for ungrateful people to occupy my space and talk bad about me
my fiancee has diagnosed depression and anxiety
she has told me that she has been very depressed for a while now and i can see it
and that me telling her that i am here for her and and to tell me what she needs is not helpful
i don't know how to give her the support that she needs or how to help her
can someone help me understand what she is going through and what i can do to help her
i didn't feel happy for a long time
last two days everything around turned into burden and tiny things like a kid screaming or even my flatmates laughing in the kitchen annoys the fuck out of me
this made me cry for an hour
i don't have time for another psychological problem
i have a family waiting for my success so i be able to help them then
i have thoughts ramming my head from the inside that all of this is only excuses to push away these responsibilities
i don't know what to do i have no idea where to start and i feel numb
i just drew that out of nowhere it was luck not me
i'm losing motivation to draw anything it's been days
with my father not carrying about what i love and want to do
my mother left me with my sister
it's just that i feel like i'm not the only one struggling
i don't want to make everything about myself
i can tell when someone's done listening to me
i can tell if someone hates me
i can tell when someone's hiding something from me
or lying to me
i'm so tired
my mind is toxic
there's only negativity in my head
someone close to me actually said i won't kill myself
he said i'm just overreacting looking for attention
if you've read this far thank you
personally my anhedonia and passive suicidality leaves me pretty emotionless and immune to all of the panic and anxiety surrounding this
really not the same for me
so my bf got mad at me last night
i'm the only one who texts who calls and since quarantine my depression's been getting worse
i'm having suicidal thoughts i even started cutting again i'm trying to have it under control
so we haven't heard from eachother in two days because i decided i should see if he's gonna text or something if he's gonna fucking remember his girlfriend exists
i got drunk so i told him that again i don't want to talk about it especially not while i'm drunk
and then last night he was like 'bravo good fucking job
i got hurt by that he knows that i always get hurt by stuff like that and i told him that that's not really nice and that he has no right to be mad at me for my decisions
since then we haven't talked but he posted some really weird stuff i think he even hates me now
my friends have been telling that he's emotionally abusing me they think that he's not good for me
but i really love him
he told me multiple times that he just can't be there for me always and tbh he's never really there for me
it's always just me trying to give advice and listening to him
i mean yes i told him some of my problems but he would never try to help they usually just get brushed off as something not that important
i just hate this i hate the way he makes me feel worried all the time by his 'i wanna overdose' posts
but i'd never leave him
i still wanna be there for him even if i feel like shit
i still can't get myself to open up to him he already has his problems
i just feel like dying i just wanna end it
everything's falling apart in my life and now this
i wish at least my bf would love me but now he's acting like he despises me
i am sick and tired of being a constant failure at anything i do
the fact have zero accomplishments other than having survived thus far shadows over my every thought and decision
and all this shit in my hand while the guy next to me can draw play the pianois academicaly above average isnt half deaf kicks ass in karate and shit
and im sitting here with what i feel like is a frankenstein like patch work body with operations holding me together
but they'll always find ways and reasons to ignore you and make you feel like you don't belong here
they make you feel like you're not welcome to be a part of their circle
but you find that everywhere you go people behave the same way with you ignoring you making you feel like shit everytime you try to strike a conversation or be a part of what they're doing
so you question yourself am i the reason behind all this cold behaviour
am i the problem
why can't i for once have a meaningful bond with someone that'll last for more than a week
am i such an awful person
i'm really struggling at the moment and depression and suicidal thoughts and ideation are very high right now
because of all of this i have chronic complex ptsd depression suicidal thoughts and a whole load of anxiety
now after dropping out i moved to a place with other people who can't fit in society to spend my days
all that is left is staring blankly at the wall and contemplate life or rather death
the only thing that is still open is the shelter but i was banned from it because i had a minor cold
i understand that but every second i'm bombarded by thoughts telling me i'm lesser i'm stupid i'm worthless and that i should die with no shield

the first half was her loudly complaining about her paused studies the fact that she can't see her friends and drink coffee with them how her life used to be a rollercoaster before coming to a screeching halt that she's stuck with us
but then it turned to the topic of me going to the shelter how i shouldn't that it was dangerous for her and my mom how i was selfish for wanting to go

when i tried to explain i had nothing to distracted me from the constant traumas and terrible thoughts she literally told me to learn how to braid grass so i would 'have my necessary distraction' before she continued to rant about her terrible life
they told me and i quote the sleeping all day and not spending time with us has got to stop its not fair to us

i apologize so deeply for being unable to do anything but sleep however i will not apologize for my lack of time spent with you one can only handle so much toxicity and im trying to keep my exposure at a minimum in these trying times
i honestly dont understand
they constantly talk behind my back about how terrible of a daughter i am so why is my presence of any concern to them
my whole life ive been nothing more than a science experiment to them and even my best accomplishments mean nothing if im not striving for something bigger and better each day
theres no time to breathe in this house and its suffocating
i just want out
no one will probably even read this
but im giving up today
i looked in the mirror and i didnt recognize anything
how could my eyes that i always got compliments on just be so fucking empty
but this is so hopeless
i dont feel anything and dont want to
we coexist with monsters at worst decent people at best who in the end are all self serving
parents try to shield their kids from our harsh reality without ever considering that the best way to do that is to not have kids at all
dont look up statistics on this kind of stuff unless you want your day ruined
yet normal folks can shut this all out with their little things and were the mentally ill
we are usually so trapped in the motions of the day that we dont even stop to consider why were doing what were doing
and yet the only reason i carry on is so i dont inflict pain on the people i care about
my mom cried a lot but it whent better that i expected
and after all i think it was a good thing to tell them how bad i was feeling
i can't do work
i just sleep all day and mindlessly play tetris
antidepressants aren't helping
exercise helped a little but i fell off the wagon
now i've sunk so far that i can't even force myself to do that
i can't do any of the things i need to do
i can't even do the things i want to do
i can just do mindless tasks and sleep
how am i going to pay off my student loans if i fail out of college
i wish i just had one little thing i could latch onto
instead i just lie on my bed in the dark trying to convince myself to work out
i'm so tired
but it comes back so suddenly completely without warning
youre sitting surrounded by the people you love the people you were just laughing with and you feel empty
you get so exhausted and next thing you know there is nothing you want to do more than leave
you make a dumb excuse and leave your friends family whoever
and now youre trapped by the monster inside your head again
death or battling your own mind for an undetermined amount of time until you finally feel okay again
but its not the same
you know youve never held on to the happiness before
destroying myself from the inside out
whats the point of living this way
wouldnt it be easier to feel nothing
but a part of you keeps going because theres the smallest hope left inside of you
maybe i will stay happy this time
maybe im finally normal
but you know thats a lie
youll never be normal again
im being taken over
can this be over yet
but it will never be over until i die
i blame myself and i can't help it
i know he is sad and he blames me
i wanted to keep them safe
i just want to know i'm not alone
that i'm not the only one that see friends having babies and cries
i don't want to be sensitive but i can't help it
please help me reddit
my father said this to me i was crying and begging him to understand but he thinks i'm a freak
he keeps putting up these in spiritual videos of depressed people who turn happy
he says that i'm an embarrassment that there are only two roads in this life get muscles and girls or stay at home and get fat and lonely
i hate how shallow this world is
no one has respect for genuine people i wish they all suffered from depression for a day so that they understood
my father is talking about me downstairs
he talks about how i ruined my chances and that i've fucked up my life
please someone i beg you please tell me that i'm not insane i'm just different i didn't choose to be this way but normal people never accepted me
i've never actually turned to the internet to vent before but i'm hoping it will help
i've always suffered with depression i've always had those days where i didn't want to move and lay in bed all day you know the kind of days
since this lockdown stuff i have slumped majorly
i've only left bed to pee and get food
i haven't showered in weeks
i'm finding it hard to do anything
i can't get out of my own head
i tried to turn to my family for advice but i keep getting you get to sit in bed for the next weeks what's not to like
they don't understand that being forced into responsibility was my crutch
my mind has been running crazy with all the time i've been spending alone
im just finding everything hard lately
i'm really struggling with myself
i dont want to complain about my mentally statement
i just really need someone to talk to
can anyone feel free to talk
you can save a life
wasn't making me feel like dirt their ultimate goal from the beginning
i just don't like being around her
too many memories that i can't seem to forget no matter how hard i try
i distance myself so he won't have to worry about me
i hope he can learn from my mistakes and be a better person
i feel like im being made fun of or people only say it because they want to be nice and they feel sorry for me
i never know if someone is being for real and it sucks
just please someone help me feel like i'm not alone
if you're gunna accuse me of begging for attention you're right because i absolutely am
this is the same ex who left me to kill myself in december because he wanted to go drinking with his cooler friends
he told me to my face i wasnt fun enough and he didnt like being around me and hed been lying about going out previously because he didnt want to have to invite me
he told me i was boring and he didnt want to put up with me anymore
i know i shouldnt care now because its been a few months and i really should have better things to think about but i cant help wondering why he cares about mental health all of a sudden
he used to tell everyone i was lying about my depression anxiety to the point he had my other friends convinced i was lying about it all
even now these friends dont talk to me and they still tell everyone im not actually depressed what do they want from me a doctors note
why wasnt i good enough for him to care take it seriously
why does he suddenly care about mental health now im not in the picture
no one really cares enough to even think about you most of the time at least for me
people are just naturally selfish
people can support you but in the end they see themselves more important because that is the human way
selfishness is natural as most say you need to be able to help yourself before helping others
do people really want to help though
its just very hard
seems like every time i try to better myself i get held back
people doubt me
i stay up all night escaping reality with video games only to wake up and work out as little as i can and play video games sleep rinse and repeat
we all have our own issues but itd be real nice to have some sort of support because we were all put here to work together i believe
sadly no one really does this
thanks in advance if you read it all and if you didnt i understand
stay healthy and safe
the pandemic is literally changing everyones lives and it has made my depression way worse than when i had my job that i could distract myself with
now im stuck all alone with my thoughts and feelings in my room
i just want to fade away so bad
i dont have anyone at this point
im ready to give up
i cant afford a therapist and i cant afford medication
life is so meaningless
crazy how some people were born so fucking blessed with amazing features
every time i try to go to sleep i feel just horribly sad for no reason
i was having a good day i was laughing for the first time since my girlfriend dumped me a month ago
i wish i could just cry and get rid of it but i've been dealing with depression my whole life so i know it doesn't work like regular sadness
a lazy flake that just doesnt want to do anything besides hibernate in their own little world alone
someone who doesnt go through with plans and then is too anxious to follow up until way later
we would do what we could to help each other through the tougher times
choosing her over my roommate i ended up screwing my friend over and never seeing him again
worst decision i could have made
i never wanted to fuck him over like that
i suffer everyday thinking about how shitty of a person i have to be to do that to him
i'm so sorry buddy i wish i could take it back
i dont expect him to ever forgive me
i wish i could tell him how stupid i was
i miss our friendship and i hope hes doing well
i only seem to learn things by kinesthetic so i'm more used to hands on physical work and simply sitting here and watching or memorizing lectures is very difficult for me
i kept promising my roommate and myself that i'd do programming courses to get certifications because my job hunting has been crippled moreso because of the virus
but i can't take any because most of them would all be just running by me things on what to do
it'd require me to spend a lot of time watching a video to a course like times before i even get a remote idea
it just feels like i've been wasting time and money on these things
you probably have been feeling depressed for one or two years or longer but feel like it's just a constant dread of living with no significant ups or downs
when i was diagnosed with this i was sceptical at first but now that i read through the wikipedia article it made me realise how accurate it is
title says it all i couldnt stop crying because of how shitty my life was
i quickly planned to get a belt and hang myself downstairs at am but i could not find this fucking belt so i just gave up and cried some more in bed
ever since i was young ive been made fun of for being stupid or slow

my friends and family have constantly called me an idiot and through negative reinforcement like not doing well on my sats despite studying or making stupid mistakes or having bad memory i constantly get treated like an idiot and i am constantly made fun of any time i get close to someone
i am not quite sure how to handle my self esteem when what people call me has proven to be true
i am an idiot and i feel like an idiot in a world full of geniuses causing me to stay inside all day and never go out
fuck ive been outsmarted by people half my age
i know im hurting myself and everyone around me
get in a tub lay down take the pills and down a bottle of cheap dry red wine
i am nothing and will always be nothing
pathetic sad lazy and a fucking failure
i have no ambitions goals
ill always be a scared unlovable and unsuccessful piece of shit
going to have to wait until monday fucking police curfew everythings closed
